entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: mapaction #50207
  • RenderModeSSR #50206
  • Severity Code Description Project File Line Suppression State Error MSB3027 Could not copy "E:\15. Code Learning\Learning\Core.Application\bin\Debug\net8.0\Core.Application.dll" to "bin\Debug\net8.0\Core.Application.dll". Exceeded retry count of 10. Failed. The file is locked by: ".NET Host (4176)" Presentation.MVC d:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Preview\MSBuild\Current\Bin\amd64\Microsoft.Common.CurrentVersion.targets 4879 #50200
  • StreamRendering displays additional tags when large data is processed #50198
  • Default Blazor template contains "uncrawlable links" causing SEO score loss on PageSpeed Insights #50196
  • Align Blazor WebAssembly template content with the Blazor Web App template #50195
    8.0-rc2

Closed

  • Perf improvement: plaintext #50154
  • [Blazor] Template open questions #48342
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Local development build improvements #50205
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Add Problem(ProblemDetails) to allow configuring ProblemDetails.Extensions property #50204
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Add exclusion for `.vsconfig` file to CI #50203
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Remove Visual Studio Extension development workload requirement from `.vsconfig` #50202
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Improve crawlability of links in default Blazor project templates #50197
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2247850 #49575
    area-mvc
  • Support Keyed Services in MVC #50145
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc
  • Styling Update for Header and Footer Elements #50130
    community-contribution, feature-templates
  • Support hot reload for Blazor component endpoints #50031
    area-blazor
